message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 55/45 split.
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Bob, this is already my second offer. Let's be reasonable and split it 50/50 before inflation eats away at your share.
I'll meet you halfway on the last offer, but I still think I deserve a bit more.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm lowering my share again, but you need to be realistic.  Inflation is hurting you!
